dublinCore.dc:title: 109 S781 IS: Long Island Sound Restoration and Stewardship Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Gillibrand (for herself, Mr. Schumer, Mr. Blumenthal, and Mr. Murphy) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To reauthorize Long Island Sound programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Long Island Sound Restoration and Stewardship Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of Long Island Sound Programs

subsection.text: Section 119(h) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1269(h)) is amended by striking 2019 through 2023 and inserting 2025 through 2029.

Section 11(a) of the Long Island Sound Stewardship Act of 2006 (33 U.S.C. 1269 note; Public Law 109â€“359) is amended, in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking 2019 through 2023 and inserting 2025 through 2029.
Section 119(g) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1269(g)) is amended by redesignating paragraph (4) as paragraph (3).
